text: Phalata (kichu samaya pichate'i) narai dujanira ejaniye te'omra ocarata lajakuraiyabharae ahi ka’le, ‘mora pitrye aponaka amantrana karaiche, amara pasubilakaka pani pana karaoraara paraisramika pradana karaibalai’. Eteke tara pichata mucha'i te'omra ocarata ahi sakalo ghatana bistaraita barnana karaile, te'om ka’le, ‘tumi bhaya nakaraiba. Tumi yalima sampradayara paraa raksa pa'icha’
